text: Simplifies the building of tools that incrementally modify geometry based on strokes.
This node records strokes using the Stroke State
. The Geometry plugged into the first input is run through a
, with one iteration per recorded stroke. Within this
, it’s possible to set up a SOP network that modifies the input geometry based on the shape and attributes of the recorded stroke.
The geometry is cached after each stroke, so that each stroke only requires the
to cook for that one new stroke.
